title: Un Punto Macrobiotico - San Lorenzo
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Italian, Macrobiotic, Organic, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Store with a self-service deli and pastry shop. All vegan except for fish. Pastries are usually sweetened with malt, occasionally honey is used. In the same neighborhood on Via dei Campani 65 it also operates a restaurant making vegan pizzas in addition to macrobiotic meals for dinner. Store sells macrobiotic packaged food, sourdough bread, fresh fruit and vegetables.
